channel.title: Custom client with server
channel.description:
Ok, well heres my server!
(p.s my client says deltascape at top because i use it but it is extremely edited with stuff like dragon pl8 ect in it!)
heres my client:http://uppit.com/V2006K (does connect to my server because i 2 lazy 2 change SORRY!)
this owns look at picture below!!!!!!!!
know ill do picutres before download >.<
(also my server has rep system you can see when you log on)
http://uppit.com/L3BY6Y is download
credits
40-50% reaper for base and a bit 50-60% me for adding stuff and my client
server has..
5 different train places!(i made 3)
4 different pk spots!(i made 2)
client has...
dragon plate dragon kite dragon bow 10 different custom party hats summoning cape!!!! rune c bow(like on ddsspeced client) lava blade twin bladed godsowrds
and many more!!!
and much more like bandos whip barrows defender and more!!!!!!!!!!!!!
my server includes custom minigames
like the bananan minigame
you collect bananas to buy armour or weapons
you can trade 100 bananas for something that you put on and when you put on you turn into huge BANANA!
picture!!

item.title: Custom client with server
item.dc:creator: @i_like_rsps i like rsps
item.description:
@i_like_rsps wrote:

u change it and you need commands to get around fool

try

::dramen
::testminigame

there just examples

and the main thing is the client
